group_1.textLeft: You really come here every day, Shirogane.

group_1.textRight: I have to prove that you exist, Himuro-senpai.

group_1.textLeft: That's quite a heavy role to take on.
It seems like everyone around you is busy@preparing for the Festival.
What about you? Your family are farmers, right?

group_1.textRight: Aren't you helping out in connection to the@Yukuni Hot Springs Village too, Himuro-senpai?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not interested in the Festival either,@so I'll just be helping out lightly that day.

group_1.textRight: Aren't you and I the same?
What is it?@You're staring at me all of a sudden.

group_1.textLeft: ...Let me stare a little longer.

group_1.narration: Although I have recently made the acquaintance of@Magical Girls such as Miura and Kurusu, prior to then@I was always alone, with no one other than my family@to prove my existence but this Shirogane alone.
Surely she is not presenting me@with a false image of herself.
And yet,@I am pretending to be something I am not to her,@who continues to accept me for who I am.
To be frank, if the me she's been recognizing is false,@then I have never been proven to exist.
Not only that, but I would also be causing the@meaning of the existence known as Shirogane,@which is preserved by proving my existence,@to be lost; I would be betraying her.

group_1.textLeft: (I can't tolerate that...)
Shirogane...

group_1.textRight: Yes, you've been acting strange since a moment@ago. What's going on?

group_1.textLeft: The truth is, I've been hiding something...

group_1.textRight: Hiding something? You don't seem to be two-faced@or anything, though.

group_1.textLeft: But I do have a hidden side. I want to confess it.
For I think it'll be sincerity to you, who is proving@me real...

group_1.textRight: ...Understood. Then, I'll listen with all my heart.
I would never make fun of you.

group_1.textLeft: ...The truth is―

group_1.narration: Why am I at a loss for words here?
Because this Magical Girl thing is a secret...?@Because somewhere deep down I think I'll be hated?@That I'll be perceived as a weirdo?@That I'll be rejected?
There's no need to feel this anxiety,@and all that is so alien to Shirogane.
There will be nothing wrong with it, there shouldn't be!

group_1.textLeft: Listen, Shirogane! The truth is―
[chara:103301:effect_shake][flashEffect:flashRed1]Ungh?!

group_1.textCenter: What is the you that I have seen? Who are you?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103301:effect_shake]Stop, my neck's going to...
(A Witch's kiss...)
(I can't believe I didn't notice the reaction nearby...)
[flashEffect:flashWhite1]Ugh!
How undeserving I am, to be caught up in my@own self...
